                                              throws IOException
        Convenience method for parseRequestHeaders(java.io.InputStream, java.nio.charset.Charset) with default charset
        Parameters:
        input - An input stream, preferably buffered
        Returns:
        A map of header names and values
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseRequestHeaders

        public static Map<String,String> parseRequestHeaders(@NonNull
                                     InputStream input,
                                     @NonNull
                                     Charset charset)
                                              throws IOException
        Read SCGI request headers from InputStream. After calling this method you can read the body of the request manually from the same stream.
        Parameters:
        input - An input stream, preferably buffered
        charset - Charset to use during decoding
        Returns:
        A map of header names and values
        Throws:
        IOException

      • makeResponse

        public static String makeResponse(@NonNull
                  String body)
        Convenience method for makeResponse(java.lang.String, java.util.Map) with no extra headers
        Parameters:
        body - Text to send. Cannot be null
        Returns:

      • makeResponse

        public static String makeResponse(@NonNull
                  String body,
                  @NonNull
                  Map<String,String> extraHeaders)
        Make an SCGI response. The following headers will be added if they do not exist in extraHeaders:
        • Status: 200 OK
        • Content-Type: text/plain
        • Content-Length: [length of body]
        Parameters:
        body - Text to send. Cannot be null
        extraHeaders - Headers to send. Cannot be null
        Returns:
        A full SCGI response

      • sendResponse

        public static void sendResponse(@NonNull
                String body,
                @NonNull
                Map<String,String> extraHeaders,
                @NonNull
                OutputStream output)
                         throws IOException
        Convenience method for sendResponse(java.lang.String, java.util.Map, java.io.OutputStream, java.nio.charset.Charset) with default charset
        Parameters:
        body - Text to send. Cannot be null
        extraHeaders - Additional headers to send. Cannot be null
        output - Stream to send response on. Cannot be null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • sendResponse

        public static void sendResponse(@NonNull
                String body,
                @NonNull
                Map<String,String> extraHeaders,
                @NonNull
                OutputStream output,
                @NonNull
                Charset charset)
                         throws IOException
        Send an SCGI response on the specified OutputStream
        Parameters:
        body - Text to send. Cannot be null
        extraHeaders - Additional headers to send. Cannot be null
        output - Stream to send response on. Cannot be null
        charset - Charset of stream. Cannot be null
